actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to extend the right to vote in primary and runoff elections for federal office to citizens who will be 18 years of age or older on the date of the related general and special election.

summary.text: Grants the right to vote in any primary or runoff election for Federal office to citizens who will be 18 years of age or older on the date of the related general or special election.

titles.title: A bill to extend the right to vote in primary and runoff elections for federal office to citizens who will be 18 years of age or older on the date of the related general and special election.
